name: Publish And Redirect To Add New Post
author: Mindstien Technologies

sections.description:
By default when you add new post and hit ‘publish’ or ‘save draft’ button, wordpress redirects to ‘post edit screen’ of the same post, but this little plugin will help you go to add new post screen each time you add new post to help you keep adding multiple posts more faster.

update: added 3rd button for ‘publish and visit now’ to redirect to the post or page after publish. See the screenshots.

Hire plugin author for your WordPress Development.

Visit official website for this plugin at Mindstien Technologies.
sections.installation: 1. Install and activate the plugin just like any other wordpress plugin.
sections.faq:
What this plugin does ?

This plugin will add two new buttons on ‘publish’ meta box as show in screenshot.
sections.changelog:
1.4 bug fixed for page to page redirection.
1.3 Added new button for ‘publish & visit now’, see the screenshot
1.2 bug fixed….
1.1 “publish” button bug fixed. Now both button works ok. Tested.
1.0 Initial version

short_description: Redirects to 'Add new post' page after 'save draft' or 'publish post' for faster adding mulitple posts.
